PerfectNetExp.abs: Studies on the genus Eriocaulon from China.中国谷精草属植物研究。

means.word_mean: 1. type genus of the Eriocaulaceae: rushlike aquatic or marginal perennials usually found in shallow waters of acid lakes and pools and bogs
